nodes.id: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

zh-cn: 中国西昌卫星发射中心
中国人民解放军第二十七试验训练基地
en: 27th Experimental Training Base of the People's Liberation Army

location.zh-cn: 四川省凉山彝族自治州西昌市
location.en: Xichang, Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture, Sichuan Province

description.zh-cn: 中国的导弹与卫星发射基地之一，成立于1970年，总部位于四川省西昌市，发射场位于冕宁县。该中心同时管辖海南省的文昌航天发射场。
description.en: One of China's missile and satellite launch bases, established in 1970. Its headquarters is in Xichang, Sichuan, with the launch site in Mianning County. The center also administers the Wenchang Space Launch Site in Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军种之一，负责管理中国的军事航天力量。西昌卫星发射中心是其下属单位。
description.en: A service of the People's Liberation Army responsible for managing China's military space forces. The Xichang Satellite Launch Center is a subordinate unit.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军种之一，西昌卫星发射中心曾于2015年底转隶该部队。
description.en: A service of the People's Liberation Army. The Xichang Satellite Launch Center was transferred to this force at the end of 2015.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总装备部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总装备部
en: General Armaments Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的四总部之一，在2015年军队改革前是西昌卫星发射中心的上级单位。
description.en: Formerly one of the four general headquarters of the People's Liberation Army. It was the superior unit of the Xichang Satellite Launch Center before the 2015 military reform.

description.zh-cn: 中国的第一个载人航天计划，于1970年代提出。西昌卫星发射中心最初便是为该计划而选址建设的。
description.en: China's first manned space program, proposed in the 1970s. The Xichang Satellite Launch Center was originally selected and built for this project.

description.zh-cn: 1969年日益恶化的中苏关系是促使中国决定在内陆三线地区建设新的航天发射场（即后来的西昌卫星发射中心）的重要原因。
description.en: The deteriorating Sino-Soviet relations in 1969 was a significant reason for China's decision to build a new space launch center (later the Xichang Satellite Launch Center) in the inland 'Third Front' region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，时任中国酒泉卫星发射中心司令员，1970年带领工作人员为714工程踏勘并最终选定冕宁为场址。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army and then-commander of the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center. In 1970, he led a team to survey and ultimately select Mianning as the site for Project 714.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国酒泉卫星发射中心副司令员，1970年与李福泽一同带领工作人员踏勘并最终选定冕宁为场址。
description.en: Then-deputy commander of the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center. In 1970, along with Li Fuze, he led a team to survey and ultimately select Mianning as the site.

nodes.id: 1996年长征三号乙火箭发射事故

zh-cn: 1996年长征三号乙火箭发射事故

location.zh-cn: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 在西昌卫星发射中心发生的一次严重发射事故，长征三号乙运载火箭在发射国际通信卫星708星时失控坠毁，造成重大人员伤亡和财产损失。
description.en: A major launch accident at the Xichang Satellite Launch Center where a Long March 3B rocket went out of control and crashed while launching the Intelsat 708 satellite, causing significant casualties and property damage.

description.zh-cn: 一颗国际通信卫星，在1996年2月15日由长征三号乙运载火箭于西昌卫星发射中心发射时，因火箭失控而坠毁。
description.en: An international communications satellite that was destroyed when the Long March 3B rocket carrying it went out of control and crashed during launch from the Xichang Satellite Launch Center on February 15, 1996.

description.zh-cn: 中国的月球探测计划。为准备该工程的发射任务，西昌卫星发射中心于2006年对三号发射塔进行了重建。
description.en: China's lunar exploration program. In preparation for its launch missions, the Xichang Satellite Launch Center rebuilt its No. 3 launch tower in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国海南省文昌市的航天发射场，由西昌卫星发射中心负责建设、管理和使用，其临海位置解决了西昌内陆发射的部分安全问题。
description.en: A space launch site located in Wenchang, Hainan Province, China. It is constructed, managed, and used by the Xichang Satellite Launch Center. Its coastal location resolves some of the safety issues associated with inland launches from Xichang.

description.zh-cn: 玻利维亚前总统。2013年12月，他专程前往西昌卫星发射中心，现场观看了玻利维亚通信卫星的发射，成为首位在中国航天发射场观看卫星发射的外国国家元首。
description.en: Former President of Bolivia. In December 2013, he traveled to the Xichang Satellite Launch Center to watch the launch of the Bolivian Communications Satellite, becoming the first foreign head of state to witness a satellite launch at a Chinese space launch site.

description.zh-cn: 玻利维亚拥有的第一颗卫星，于2013年12月21日由中国在西昌卫星发射中心成功发射。
description.en: Bolivia's first satellite, successfully launched by China from the Xichang Satellite Launch Center on December 21, 2013.

relationships.source: 中国西昌卫星发射中心
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队

description.zh-cn: 中国西昌卫星发射中心隶属于中国人民解放军军事航天部队。
description.en: The Xichang Satellite Launch Center is subordinate to the People's Liberation Army Aerospace Force.

relationships.source: 中国西昌卫星发射中心
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

description.zh-cn: 2015年底，在深化国防和军队改革中，西昌卫星发射中心由中国人民解放军总装备部转隶新组建的中国人民解放军战略支援部队。
description.en: At the end of 2015, during the reform of national defense and the military, the Xichang Satellite Launch Center was transferred from the PLA General Armaments Department to the newly formed PLA Strategic Support Force.

relationships.source: 中国西昌卫星发射中心
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总装备部

description.zh-cn: 在2015年军队改革前，西昌卫星发射中心隶属于中国人民解放军总装备部。
description.en: Before the 2015 military reform, the Xichang Satellite Launch Center was subordinate to the PLA General Armaments Department.

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 中国文昌航天发射场由西昌卫星发射中心负责建设、管理和使用。
description.en: The Wenchang Space Launch Site is constructed, managed, and used by the Xichang Satellite Launch Center.

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 西昌卫星发射中心最初是为了“曙光一号”载人航天计划（714工程）而选址建设的。
description.en: The Xichang Satellite Launch Center was originally selected and built for the Shuguang manned space program (Project 714).

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 考虑到日益恶化的中苏关系，中国决定在内陆三线地区选址建设航天发射场，促成了西昌卫星发射中心的建立。
description.en: Considering the deteriorating Sino-Soviet relations, China decided to select a site for a space launch center in the inland 'Third Front' region, which led to the establishment of the Xichang Satellite Launch Center.

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 1970年6月，时任第二十训练基地司令员李福泽带领工作人员踏勘选定冕宁县为西昌卫星发射中心的场址。
description.en: In June 1970, Li Fuze, then commander of the 20th Training Base, led a team to survey and select Mianning County as the site for the Xichang Satellite Launch Center.

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 1970年6月，时任第二十训练基地副司令员乔平与司令员李福泽一同带领工作人员踏勘选定冕宁县为西昌卫星发射中心的场址。
description.en: In June 1970, Qiao Ping, then deputy commander of the 20th Training Base, along with commander Li Fuze, led a team to survey and select Mianning County as the site for the Xichang Satellite Launch Center.

relationships.source: 1996年长征三号乙火箭发射事故

description.zh-cn: 在1996年2月15日的发射事故中，国际通信卫星708星随失控的火箭一同被摧毁。
description.en: In the launch accident on February 15, 1996, the Intelsat 708 satellite was destroyed along with the out-of-control rocket.

relationships.source: 1996年长征三号乙火箭发射事故
relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 此次惨痛的事故发生后，西昌卫星发射中心进行了整改，发射成功率大幅提升。
description.en: After this tragic accident, the Xichang Satellite Launch Center underwent rectification, which significantly improved its launch success rate.

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 为准备嫦娥探月工程的发射任务，西昌卫星发射中心的三号发射塔于2006年8月开始被重建。
description.en: In preparation for the launch missions of the Chinese Lunar Exploration Program, the No. 3 launch tower at the Xichang Satellite Launch Center was rebuilt starting in August 2006.

relationships.source: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 2013年12月21日，中国在西昌卫星发射中心成功将玻利维亚拥有的第一颗卫星“玻利维亚通信卫星”发射升空。时任玻利维亚总统埃沃·莫拉莱斯专程到场观看。
description.en: On December 21, 2013, China successfully launched Bolivia's first satellite, the Bolivian Communications Satellite, from the Xichang Satellite Launch Center. Then-President of Bolivia, Evo Morales, made a special trip to watch the launch on-site.

relationships.target: 中国西昌卫星发射中心
